name: pinepaper-mcp
description: Create animated graphics with AI using PinePaper Studio
long_description: PinePaper MCP Server enables Claude to create, animate, and export graphics through PinePaper Studio. Features include shape creation, relation-based animations (orbits, follows, attached_to), procedural generators, visual effects, SVG export with animations, asset search & import from 4 open repositories (500k+ icons), performance metrics tracking, and enhanced error messages with canvas context.
